About universAAL Tools uCC universAAL Control Center Suite

A tool to install, manage and configure applications for universAAL at a local machine.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
universAAL Tools uCC Model A tool to install, manage and configure applications for universAAL at a local machine.
universAAL Tools uCC Controller Provides the interface with MW DeployManager.
universAAL Tools uCC Profile Agent This is a profile agent for connecting uCC to CHE/Profiling server.
universAAL Tools uCC Database A tool to install, manage and configure applications for universAAL at a local machine.
universAAL Tools uCC Frontend A tool to install, manage and configure applications for universAAL at a local machine.
universAAL Tools uCC Configuration Model A tool to install, manage and configure applications for universAAL at a local machine.
universAAL Tools uCC Configuration Configurator A tool to install, manage and configure applications for universAAL at a local machine.
universAAL Tools uCC Configuration Config Instance Storage A tool to install, manage and configure applications for universAAL at a local machine.
universAAL Tools uCC Configuration Config Definition Registry A tool to install, manage and configure applications for universAAL at a local machine.
universAAL Tools uCC Vaadin Themes A tool to install, manage and configure applications for universAAL at a local machine.
universAAL Tools uCC Deploy Manager Service API This API contains of deploy manager service interfaces for uCC.
universAAL Tools uCC Deploy Manager Service Implementation uCC deploy manager service implementation for uStore
universAAL Tools uCC Karaf feature The uCC feature for Karaf
universAAL Tools uCC Composite A tool to install, manage and configure applications for universAAL at a local machine.
